name: My Life of Repayment
description:
My Life of Repayment is a simulation game with debt repayment as the core.
The player will play the role of a cat who has just graduated from college, working around to pay off debts.

Manage finances, time and physical state

Players need to properly allocate time and money, replenish vigor, saturation and mood after work, and repay debts regularly.
Use the remaining money to buy food, or items that can improve your work efficiency.

Diverse work experience

  • Archery Performer: physical simulation gameplay that emphasizes operation
  • Drone Operator: A roguelite TD
  • Pancake Cook: cooking simulation with reaction capability + time management
